nodes.description: Combines the text of two or more strings and returns a new string.
nodes.name: concat

seperator.title: Seperator
seperator.description: Specifies the character(s) to use for separating the string. The separator is treated as a string or a regular expression. If separator is omitted, the array returned contains one element consisting of the entire string. If separator is an empty string, str is converted to an array of characters.

nodes.description: Splits a String object into an array of strings by separating the string into substrings.
nodes.name: split
